channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Product Slider For WooCommerce Lite
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Product Slider For WooCommerce Lite

item.title: CVE-2023-0537|2024-08-02T05:17:49.753Z -- unknown -- product%20slider%20for%20woocommerce%20lite
item.description: The Product Slider For WooCommerce Lite WordPress plugin through 1.1.7 does not validate and escape some of its shortcode attributes before outputting them back in a page/post where the shortcode is embed, which could allow users with the contributor role and above to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks
